local_intent: Lift the grasped white_plate along +z to a safe standoff while verifying grasp stability and object retention.
assumptions: white_plate has been grasped and gripper is closed
workspace free along z for safe retreat
sensors can report IsObjectVisible and IsGraspStable reliably
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase lift (MoveDelta axis=z) shown in the global BT after grasp verification; verifies object retention post-lift consistent with placement plan.
